column1: My Name is Sushmita Sen. I live at 6th Floor, Beach Queen, Yari Road, Versova, Andheri West, Mumbai. My mobile number is 7878249657 and email id is sushmita.sen@gmail.com. I have to raise an Complaint type: "Product Issue" about the purchased Television from Samsung. The product worked well for only 3 weeks after purchase date. There were intense sparks and after that, television stopped working. Order Number: 851513212 which was delivered on 4th May 2023. Please try to contact only via E-mail and consent is given for future marketing communications
